The lawsuit alleges monopolization and unfair competition in violation of federal and state antitrust laws.

forward_snippets: We will also adopt the following standards in future periods, none of which are expected to have a material effect on our consolidated financial statements.

These relate to extended warranty premiums, advance payments for future equipment sales, and subscription and service revenue related to precision guidance, telematic services, and other information-enabled solutions.
